mapper.sql:
FROM animal a JOIN member b ON a.mm_ifmmSeq = b.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifamGender = #{shOptionGen} AND a.ifamChipNY = #{shOptionChip} AND a.ifamVaccinateNY = #{shOptionVacc}
AND a.ifamGender LIKE CONCAT ('%',9,'%') AND a.ifamGender LIKE CONCAT ('%',10,'%') AND a.ifamGender LIKE CONCAT ('%',11,'%')
AND a.ifamChipNY LIKE CONCAT ('%',0,'%') AND a.ifamChipNY LIKE CONCAT ('%',1,'%')
AND a.ifamVaccinateNY LIKE CONCAT ('%',0,'%') AND a.ifamVaccinateNY LIKE CONCAT ('%',1,'%')
AND a.ifamName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifamKind LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND b.ifmmName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifamSeq , a.ifamName , a.ifamAge , a.ifamKind , a.ifamGender , a.ifamChipNY , a.ifamVaccinateNY , a.mm_ifmmSeq , b.ifmmSeq , b.ifmmName
ORDER BY a.ifamSeq DESC
SELECT a.* FROM animal a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifamSeq = #{ifamSeq}
SELECT ifmmSeq FROM member ORDER BY ifmmSeq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ifamSeq FROM animal ORDER BY ifamSeq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.* ,up.path ,up.uuidName FROM animal a JOIN petUploaded up ON a.ifamSeq = up.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifamSeq = #{ifamSeq}
SELECT a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmName , b.mm_ifmmSeq , b.ifamSeq FROM member a JOIN animal b ON b.mm_ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1
